channel.title: Comments on: Law & Blockchain #1: Scott Purcell

item.title: By: Ed Redman
item.dc:creator: Ed Redman
item.description: Governments of different countries will surely stop placing obstacles for distribution of cryptocurrency in the near future. The point that bitcoin looks suspicious and was used in dubious schemes. It has spoilt the reputation of crypto market. But there are altcoins which are founded on serious, honest and transparent basis. For example, MGO developing by MobileGo. Company MobileGo has started collaboration with global payment services of Xsolla. It’s indicator of bright future for MGO tokens.
item.content:encoded:
Governments of different countries will surely stop placing obstacles for distribution of cryptocurrency in the near future.
The point that bitcoin looks suspicious and was used in dubious schemes. It has spoilt the reputation of crypto market. But there are altcoins which are founded on serious, honest and transparent basis. For example, MGO developing by MobileGo.
Company MobileGo has started collaboration with global payment services of Xsolla. It’s indicator of bright future for MGO tokens.
